mapper.select: SELECT review_idx , userinfo_id , orders_idx , review_star , review_title , review_content , review_regdate FROM review WHERE review_title=#{reviewTitle}
SELECT review_idx , userinfo_id , orders_idx , review_star , review_title , review_content , review_regdate FROM review WHERE review_content=#{reviewContent}
SELECT review_idx , userinfo_id , orders_idx , review_star , review_title , review_content , review_regdate FROM review WHERE review_idx=#{reviewIdx} ORDER BY review_idx desc

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn , review_idx , userinfo_id , orders_idx , review_star , review_title , review_content , review_regdate FROM (SELECT review_idx , userinfo_id , orders_idx , review_star , review_title , review_content , review_regdate FROM review ORDER BY review_idx DESC) review) WHERE rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
